body_html: Unfortunately, just renaming the .whl file seems insufficient. You also have to rename <venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.cpython-35m-darwin.so to <venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.so. @gunan, perhaps it's worth building a 3.4 specific protobuf package.
body_text: Unfortunately, just renaming the .whl file seems insufficient. You also have to rename <venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.cpython-35m-darwin.so to <venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.so. @gunan, perhaps it's worth building a 3.4 specific protobuf package.
body: Unfortunately, just renaming the `.whl` file seems insufficient. You also have to rename `<venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.cpython-35m-darwin.so` to `<venv_path>/lib/python3.4/site-packages/google/protobuf/internal/_api_implementation.so`. @gunan, perhaps it's worth building a 3.4 specific protobuf package.
